data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bezark, Larry G. (2019): New species and distribution records for Mexican and Central American Cerambycidae (Coleoptera). Zootaxa 4551 (4): 401-414, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4551.4.1|141 occurrences
